description:
Ootani Yuri is a 6th grade student of the camellia class of the 9th elementary school and member of the http://anidb.net/ch27105 [Anti-Alien Squad]; the color of her http://anidb.net/ch27089 [Bougu] is red. She`s an only kind and has no known skills or interests.
Yuri hates the Anti-Alien Squad task (for which she was elected by her classmates); she is extremely timid, even a crybaby, and often faints because of her shocking experiences.
name: Ootani Yuri
